{{Actor| | type = Weapon | name = The Sigil, with four fragments | class = Sigil4 | game = Strife | doomednum = 80 | convid = 199, 193, 197 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Sigil|Sigil]]→Sigil4
The fourth piece of the {{Class|Sigil}} from Strife. Obtainable after you kill {{Class|AlienSpectre4|Macil's spectre}} if you are going to get the good ending. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Sigil4 : {{Class|Sigil}} { {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "I_SGL4" {{Property|Health}} 4 }
